local_intent: Ensure the grape is visible and tool yaw is 0, then repeatedly attempt fine approach/alignment to the grape and verify arrival at the target.
assumptions: Robot is already at a safe pre-grasp above the grape
coherence_with_global: Matches the global phase after MoveAbove and SetTCPYaw; uses ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.005 and timeout 1200, retries up to 3 times for misalignment, and verifies on-target with IsAt.
